alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:07PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1245 PM MST... At 1206 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rock Springs to near Lake Pleasant to near Wittmann. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Surprise, New River, Wittmann, Lake Pleasant, Vistancia and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 220 and 241. US Highway 60 between mile markers 128 and 136. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 3 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley
